name: Deepak Shah
about:
Leadership roles in planning, implementation and control of launch and revival of ad agencies and brands. Efforts resulted in significant improvements in Brand Awareness, Market Share and Business Turnaround campaigns.

Launch and revival record includes but not restricted to brands from leading local and international organizations like: AMUL, Godrej Soaps, Raymond, Hindustan Lever, ITC and VST Cigarettes, Herbertsons, McDowell's, Everest Spices, Tata Tea, Mahindra, ANZ Grindlay's Bank, Deutsche Bank, Phillips, ICI Dulux Paints, Zodiac Menswear amongst many others. These projects provided understanding of diverse products, markets, customers and competition.

Turned around numerous ad agencies in India and Sri Lanka.

Launched North India's premier real estate developer brand IREO as Chief Marketing Officer. A subsidiary of a US based $. 2 Billion PE Fund, IREO has invested in more than 3000+ acres of prime land in Gurgaon and Punjab to develop upmarket residential, commercial and mixed-use projects.

As Sr VP Marketing and Sales, at Prestige Estates Bangalore led a multi-location team based in various locations in South India. Prestige is a listed company and has delivered over 200 million square feet of residential, commercial and mixed-use developments.

Invited as Guest lecturer in advertising and brand strategy at leading management schools in India and Sri Lanka.

Since 2014, independent consultant in Marketing Communication and Brand management subjects.

name: Jackson Johnson
about:
At Cascade Realtors, our team focuses on sourcing exceptional talent and fostering robust employee relations. With an MBA from RIIM Pune, my role as a Human Resources Generalist involves streamlining HR policies and implementing strategic improvements. We prioritize proactive engagement with our team members to ensure a dynamic and supportive work environment.

Previously, as a Senior Research Associate at Research Informatic, I honed my expertise in secondary research and market analysis, contributing to the development of comprehensive business reports. My commitment lies in harnessing communication and HR management skills to drive organizational success and employee satisfaction.

current_company.name: Research Informatic
current_company.title: Former Senior Research Associate @Research Informatics/MBA Final year student of Arihant Institute of Business Management/Former Business Development Intern at Allied Market Research/Former Employee of Cognizant.

experience.title: Senior Research Associate
experience.description: Secondary Research•	Conduct comprehensive secondary research using various sources such as databases, journals, industry reports and online platforms.•	Gather relevant data and information to support research objectives.•	Analyze and synthesize existing research to identify trends, market dynamics, and industry best practices.•	Stay updated with the latest developments and advancements in the industry through continuous secondary research.Report Writing•	Provide an overview of the market and its current state.•	Conduct a comprehensive analysis of the driving factors, opportunities, challenges, and potential growth areas identified in the market.•	Perform a detailed analysis using Porter's Five Forces framework such as assess the bargaining power of suppliers and buyers, analyze the threat of new entrants and substitute products, and evaluate the intensity of competitive rivalry in the market.•	Assess the political, economic, social, technological, environmental, and legal factors.•	Analyse the value chain activities within the industry such as Identify the primary and support activities involved in the production and distribution of products or services.
experience.description_html:
Secondary Research
• Conduct comprehensive secondary research using various sources such as databases, journals, industry reports and online platforms.
• Gather relevant data and information to support research objectives.
• Analyze and synthesize existing research to identify trends, market dynamics, and industry best practices.
• Stay updated with the latest developments and advancements in the industry through continuous secondary research.
Report Writing
• Provide an overview of the market and its current state.
• Conduct a comprehensive analysis of the driving factors, opportunities, challenges, and potential growth areas identified in the market.
• Perform a detailed analysis using Porter's Five Forces framework such as assess the bargaining power of suppliers and buyers, analyze the threat of new entrants and substitute products, and evaluate the intensity of competitive rivalry in the market.
• Assess the political, economic, social, technological, environmental, and legal factors.
• Analyse the value chain activities within the industry such as Identify the primary and support activities involved in the production and distribution of products or services.

experience.title: Business Development Executive Intern
experience.description: •	Conducting market research to identify potential target markets, customer segments, and emerging trends. This involves analysing industry reports, competitor analysis, and gathering relevant market data to help the company make informed business decisions.•	Assisting in lead generation activities by identifying and qualifying potential leads or prospects. experience.title: Process Executive
experience.description: •	Reviewing and analysing healthcare insurance claims submitted by healthcare providers to determine their accuracy and completeness. This involved examining medical records, invoices, and other supporting documentation to verify the services provided, the appropriateness of treatment, and adherence to billing guidelines.•	Interpreting and applying medical codes (such as ICD-10, CPT, HCPCS) to validate the procedures and diagnoses documented in the claims.
